thread.title: Barry X Ball Reimagines Classical Art, With Help From Robots

author: Denise Blostein
title: Barry X Ball Reimagines Classical Art, With Help From Robots
text:
Barry X Ball’s latest work, “Pietà,” sits under spotlights at the Castello Sforzesco in Milan, Italy.
It is in the same castle where the sculpture that inspired it—Michelangelo’s “Pieta Rondanini”—has been on display since the 1950s. Without knowing either statue’s back story, an observer could easily mistake one for the other.
“Pietà” is... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
